hinder.translation[0].definitions[0].def: to make it difficult for something to develop or succeed
hinder.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: His career has been hindered by injury.
policies that will hinder rather than help families
hinder.translation[0].definitions[0].not: In everyday English, people often say something gets in the way of something rather than hinders it:
This could get in the way of rescue attempts.
Poor English got in the way of his progress.
